website_summaries.verdict: A fun and entertaining jumper that can keep your child well occupied while you cook or do the dishes.
pros: The toys are eye-catching and keep babies entertained well
It is pretty sturdy and does not wobble
The height adjustments are good and, even at the lowest, most babies can reach the base easily
cons: The attachments tend to come off easily
The spring at the base is not very strong, requiring the child to push off hard to bounce
Some parents have complained of paint chipping from the toys

customer_reviews.title: ... were several to choose from but I am very happy with this one
customer_reviews.text: I posted a great review for this product when I first purchased it and like everything else, time reveals all things. It's great in many ways and my granddaughter has enjoyed it. About a month after my granddaughter using it the toy with the sun/mirror on it broke. I was disappointed but she didn't mind and would still lift it up. After a while the metal rod inside poked out of the fabric. Not good. Currently we are trying to remove this toy from the body of the center. If we can't, she is not going back in it.
customer_reviews.author: I

customer_reviews.title: Broken, cheap & unstable
customer_reviews.text: Got this bouncer for our baby, as soon as we opened up the box we saw broken pieces from the cheap plastic material this bouncer is made of. I was hoping the amount of money we spent on this bouncer that it would withstand a baby being in it, but that seems like it isn’t the case thus far. See included pictures, I have contacted the company by email and still awaiting response... this seems like a long and lengthy process and I hope to see this issue get resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Grizzalee

customer_reviews.title: I put this together by myself and while it wasn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I put this together by myself and while it wasn't difficult to follow instructions I made the mistake of placing one of the green pieces in the wrong hole thinking it wouldn't make a difference. And it wouldn't be a big deal except I wanted the two tall pieces to touch each other and not be sticking out in random places, but when I tried to remove it, it was incredibly difficult. The pieces are meant to stay in their place once you put them in thats for sure. I had to get some tools and my husband finally got it out. Pay attention to where you put things!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Springy, Colorful, and Lots of Toys!
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty easy to put together and very sturdy and cute! Lots of activities for my nephew to play with! Figured I’d give an update with pictures of my nephew actually using it! He’s now 2 1/2 and obviously doesn’t use it anymore, but he used it from 4-12 months without anything ever breaking or going wrong. His favorite activity was chewing on the lion toy! The thing was very sturdy and durable, we got a great use out of it! Would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Someone was Drunk at the Quality Control Station
customer_reviews.text: This item isn’t mommy-thumb friendly. Horrible, horrible experience putting this together. Most items didn’t fit. Mostly the two pieces would be off by just a little so I’d have to bend plastic. It took me 2 days to put it together. Instructions: “press down until you hear a click”; me: *presses, presses, leans in, puts all her body weight on it, sits on it* ... nothing. I’m glad to report that after 2 days of work, some bruises, cuts and 12 Tylenols later I could finally let my LO use it ... and she hated it.
customer_reviews.author: PsychoBunny

customer_reviews.title: Very good  purchase
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product bought for my niece who is a very fussy baby. We move her from place to place to keep her entertained this keeps her occupied the longest. Very easy to put together other than they need to number the toy pieces that click on top. Yes they go in certain places and if you mess it up they are so so hard to get out.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Great price, awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grand daughter, she absolutely LOVES it! She is almost 5 mo old. And within the first 10 minutes I could tell she was straightening out her legs, and getting the hang of it, great for her motor skills. Product seems very durable,
customer_reviews.author: AngieA

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect size and she is able to turn easily
customer_reviews.text: My daughter finally loves playing with this jungle. It’s perfect size and she is able to turn easily. My only problem is the buckles for sizing. She is always moving her butt like in discomfort after a while. Update: She has been using it for 2 months now and can’t use it anymore. The seat doesn’t go well with babies growing. She is only in the 40% on charts for height she is also 14.7lb at 8 months. You would think she will be fine but nope. This item is not for long term users. So if you have a baby who is higher than 40% don’t get.
customer_reviews.author: Ashro

customer_reviews.title: Kind of hard to put together, but its great once you do.
customer_reviews.text: I spent about 25 minutes putting the bouncer together. It was missing a screw for the bouncer plate but its pretty sturdy without it, so I won't make a huge fuss. The instructions don't come with written directions, just pictures. I guessed on how most of the parts were suppose to be assembled because the pictures are a little confusing. However, my 10 month old daughter loves the product and so does her 2 year old brother.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: the kids and I love these things!
customer_reviews.text: when my daughters were babies, I had a pink one of these and we all absolutely loved it! now that I have a son too, I ordered a more boyish style (springin' safari), but it's still just as great as before :) it keeps the kids entertained, which is a big deal when they're at that age where they're not content to sit still, but they're not quite mobile yet lol plus, it helps strengthen their little leg muscles so that they CAN eventually become mobile. it's just an all-around great product. incredibly simple to put together as well!
customer_reviews.author: Elle Middaugh

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know what all the bad reviews is about. It’s easy to put together(if you read the instructions). Bought it for my 4m daughter. She’s not so entertained. What baby do you know that doesn’t always want to be carried and be entertained by loved ones. Other than that, it’s a good toy to have to place baby in to do quick things. Bathroom, cook rice, put a load in the washer, etc....
customer_reviews.author: Risa Duenas

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Nice bouncer, easy to put together and super easy to move around the house. I can hold the baby in one hand and grab it up with the other. All the toys are easy for her to reach.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble, but you need some muscle to snap in some of the pieces. The reason I give only 3 stars is that the taller pieces curve over and hit my son’s head (5 months old and tall for his age). We removed the hanging one and can’t use it because it can’t be adjusted now that it is installed.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: The directions were picture only and toward the end had a stumble but looking ahead and the picture on the box I got it. It comes with lots of cool toys, that my son loves. The jumper at the base is so perfect for my 6 month old. He bounces all day at work. No noises to loud. THAT'S NICE. It also has places for additional toys of our own. teethers. A great feature. My son throws them, so this helps not havr to wash every 5 seconds. This toy is a blessing at work with my son. I would buy it for a friend. I'm done having kids..lol
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Macias

customer_reviews.title: Different from the rest.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Love the price. Love that there isn't a bunch of noise and flashing lights. My 7 month old doesn't stay interested in it for very long, but how long would you want to stay in one place playing with the same 5 toys?? This gives you just enough time to do the dishes or fold a load of laundry. Then it's time for you to get back to your child and be interactive. Also the price is surprisingly great for the quality. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: HeathsInMaine

customer_reviews.title: Great product—-assembly is a little intense
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 5 month old daughter and she loves it! I am highly satisfied with the purchase. I took off one star because although it is easy to assemble, there are lots of little pieces and packaging that made it a little involved—especially when trying to entertain an infant at the same time. But, overall, great purchase. It’s sturdy, my daughter loves it and it provides loads of entertainment for her!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Lanter

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth it! I read a review saying it was not sturdy but it is, you do have to make sure the pieces are in properly & they are difficult to get in there but once you do they are even more difficult to get out! No way a baby is pulling this thing apart of put together correctly. We love it. My girl especially loves the lion spinner.
customer_reviews.author: BrittneySM

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt recommend at all
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I'm giving it 2 stars is because its cute but it is such poor quality. I didn't expect much for the price but the seat has no cushion at all and looks very uncomfortable. Not to mention when assembling the instructions are terrible and the notches to put the fabric for the seat on weren't even cut all the way I had to cut pieces out of multiple sections just to slide the fabric onto it. Not to mention its to big for my 6mo she can reach with her feet but not the toys very well at all and she is 25in
customer_reviews.author: jlgrooms13

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, shipping wayyy to long
customer_reviews.text: Shipping took forever as well as delivery!! I expected more from this as to what it does. My baby girl is 9months and sit inside it with her knees bent. Cant really jump around as she would fully have to extend her feet to jump. Btw she is petite. It Maybe that my expectations were higher and the wait time made it everything worse. Sorry but am disappointed with the item
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Chico

customer_reviews.title: takes up a lot of space and not easily stored away when not in use
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but not simple to put together. My granddaughter enjoys all the toy attachments. However, takes up a lot of space and not easily stored away when not in use. Given a do over, I would have purchased a regular, clasp able walker instead. However, great if this is what you are looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didnt give this product 5 stars is because it came a bit damaged, but still works. My 5 month old loves it, it does seem a big wobbly, but I'm not sure if that is the intent
customer_reviews.author: Jana Mewes

customer_reviews.title: Good product and baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: As described. Easy assembly but be sure each item is where it goes because once in place hard to remove! Didn’t like the longer items as they are right in baby’s face so took one off. Think the angles could have been different to allow for room.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Grisham

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the money I paid, but they could make improvements.
customer_reviews.text: I like it overall, but there are some issues. First, there is a tag on the (I guess you can call it a tree) on the striped tree with the mirror, which my baby tries to eat. Second, the top of the seat could have some cushion. The extra knobs that are there to put extra toys on are useless because they are too close together for you to really put anything on it. Overall, my daughter likes it. I was worth the money I spent for it (I paid less than $50). It does allow me to put her in the seat and do dishes or fold clothes, without having to hold onto her.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: The Best Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the item for my grandson when I baby sit him. He loves the Safari, especially since he bounces, he's a six month old boy, therefore it was important to buy a durable item.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Fun and durrable
customer_reviews.text: This is a lifesaver. My daughter started using it at 5 months. She loves it. We sit her in it while we are making dinner or to busy to pay constant one on one attention to her. She is now 7 months and still loves it. Held up to me carrying her around it into to move her many times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a fun bouncer for your Child.
customer_reviews.text: My Great Granddaughter has enjoyed this .It keeps her busy and it ajusts at the seat for when the grow.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Bray

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an open box item and was very disappointed to receive it with several missing parts. I knew it was a gamble that it might be a little beat up but was not expecting to have a leg missing and several other parts. This item shouldn’t have been posted for sale with all the missing pieces. Now I have to deal with returning this bulky item. If I could give zero stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bouncer!
customer_reviews.text: Only downside is it collects dirt in the bottom other then that great item, my little one loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Ckal2514

customer_reviews.text: Discovered one of the pieces was cracked during assembly. Too much trouble to disassemble and return so kept it. I like the brand but not happy about spending almost $70 for a damaged item. I give the durability3 stars because I’m not sure what will happen as baby gets bigger
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Broken but still working
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! Just wish it wouldn't have come broken. It is usable, but one of the three pieces that actually hold the top on, came broken. Tried super glue/gorilla glue but it just broke off again. Didn't seem to be a huge issue, just don't like paying so much money for something and not getting it 100%
customer_reviews.author: Leyna Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Not for tall or active babies.
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed because after 2 hours of assembly not only is my daughter too tall for this item she is underwhelmed. The bouncer barely bounces and the toys don’t provide much stimulation. My mother purchased a “baby einstein journey of discovery activity jumper” and my daughter jumps and plays on that thing all day! That’s what I was expecting for this item but did not receive. It’s very cute but I would not recommend for tall(er) or more active babies.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Walker

customer_reviews.title: She Loves It!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my granddaughter when she was 3 1/2 months old and she has enjoyed it now for 4 months. She is now starting to do a lot more exploring so in order to keep her from getting into everything I still put her in her saucer and she still has just as much fun in it. It is a very colorful product and very durable. It also comes apart easily if you need to go out of town. It is well worth the price of $50.00
customer_reviews.author: RD Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: We first put our little one in here when she was about 3.5 months old. She really was just practicing holding her head up. Now 4 months later this is her favorite toy. She turns herself around easily and all of the pieces are easily used by a child. Only complaint I have is that some of the toys could be placed differently. The parrot is kind of a hazard when the child is still very wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: mamashank

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: Being a 7 months old little brother is not easy and this toy allows my grandson to view the room and watch his big brother run around. Lots of activities too.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: they're useless.
customer_reviews.text: The maker of this product includes 6 plastic, 1.5 in wheels, and there's place to install them. There are 4 slots on the bottom, but wheels don't stay in place and when you look at the set already assembled, wheels don't even touch the floor.... Throw away the wheels; they're useless.
customer_reviews.author: Marcello

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Our newest granddaughter loves her safari set. Grandpa had an easy time putting it together for her. She loves all the interesting toys and colors on it. Very sturdy too.
customer_reviews.author: randee hochspeier

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying my son loves it it was easy to snap together nothing coming off my only complaint is that the box was opened and ripped and it was a little dusty I also wish I would’ve got something that lighted up or played music but overall my son is happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bouncer. It was perfect for our granddaughter. Had lots of toys that kept her entertained. It was a good price and well made. We will now use it for our second granddaughter. Still in brand new condition
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not really bouncing
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it didn’t bounce the way I though it would, it would be nice for baby’s who doesn’t want to bounce maybe ages like 4- 6 months
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: I don't know but my kid doesn't like it. I am hoping she will some day
customer_reviews.text: I don't know but my kid doesn't like it. I am hoping she will some day.. I started using it since she was 6 months old and now is 8 months old But still doesn't like being inside it. Maybe once she is older she will like it. My friends' kids have loved it though. My kid likes the jumper in the day care but she doesn't like using this one at home.
customer_reviews.author: Khandle

customer_reviews.title: Your baby will love it!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived faster than expected! Comes in a huge lightweight box. Kind of annoying to assemble but not too hard. Parts are not labeled so that kind of delays the process. My niece is five months old and loves it though! Overall, happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Key

customer_reviews.title: All in all tho it is fine, baby enjoys playing in it and its a ...
customer_reviews.text: It really doesn't bounce. The seat is also more of a bucket without cushioning. Add a blanket to help as needed. All in all tho it is fine, baby enjoys playing in it and its a fair price
customer_reviews.author: Tofu Joe

customer_reviews.title: Pieces don’t fit well together
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall concept but the two taller pieces don’t fit properly into the base so they pull out super easily. To keep them from hurting my baby accidentally I just took them off but that’s kind of a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bouncy bouncy
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old daughter loves this product. The only thing i dont like about it, is how it adjusts for growth. Otherwise it is the perfect bouncer activity center. Various toys for her to play with and keep her entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Tatertot

customer_reviews.title: I like it so far
customer_reviews.text: My 5 months loves this game it has lot of toys in it it keeps her entertained! I love the colors but the think is that ive noticed that my little one get tired quickly and feels like she wants to sleep it is very very hard ti assemble also if u mistaken its hard to pull it out .... so just follow the instruction book and ull be good ur baby will love it anyway
customer_reviews.author: Judia alami

customer_reviews.title: Love that it has the little palm tree and mirror ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves playing in this toy. It has lots of different toys that grab her attention. Love that it has the little palm tree and mirror at a higher level which encourages her to reach because she was having trouble doing that. The only thing is that I wish the seat itself were padded....at least the backing should be padded but it's not and it's pretty hard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for baby
customer_reviews.text: My baby enjoys playing in this and I like the color scheme/toys, which are much less obnoxious than similar items of this nature. I like that the color scheme is good for boys or girls. The only thing I don't love is that the height is adjusted by clips on the seat. Some of the pricier exersaucers have legs that elevate as the baby grows. I can appreciate why people spend a little more for that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Becky O.

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly and all necessary parts were included in box. Only problem is that my 4 month old is a little too short for her feet to be able to reach the bottom. After putting it together I tried sitting my daughter in it and she immediately started to cry. I think maybe she was too young for this type of toy. I guess I will just keep trying to put her in it and see if she starts to like it eventually. Also, the toy would be better if it played music. Overall I would recommend the product but maybe wait until your baby is 5-6 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and entertaining!
customer_reviews.text: Our little angel loves this! From when she was very small and just able to sit up to learning to walk and playing as she made her way around the outside. The music is entertaining and fun. It folds up neatly for storage and transports outside with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves it! Keeps her busy
customer_reviews.text: My baby girl loves it!. This keeps her busy and helps strengthen her legs and her coordination. The only problem is that bird. Her arm got stuck under it and she freaked out. I was sitting right next to her when this happened so I'm contemplating removing that one part.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie G.

customer_reviews.title: ... when they grow instead of moving up the sides like some. The seat adjusts with some buckles underneath
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this but only the seat adjusts for when they grow instead of moving up the sides like some. The seat adjusts with some buckles underneath. When we received it she was already too tall for it. We still use it for short periods of time when she goes to her grandparents. I prefer the one we have at our own house that has springs and allows for more jumping. I wouldn't recommend this model.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us
customer_reviews.text: This fit our needs perfectly! The seat is adjustable and the unit can rotate completely. The baby can reach and manipulate the brightly colored engaging activities. I wish the palm tree and sun/mirror could be rotate outward a little bit because it tends to be too close to the baby. I haven't been able to figure out if it can yet or not.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Mae

customer_reviews.title: Very playful in one area
customer_reviews.text: So far my little one and I enjoy this. He loves playing in it . So many different activities for him to turn to. He’s 6 month old and loves touching everything so this is a great way to keep him entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Nothing is impossible when you try
customer_reviews.text: I want this for my great granddaughter who has spina bifida she is able to sit up and I make sure her feet are planted on the saucer part of the activity center she loved it she smiled from ear to ear because she could sit up and do something by herself
customer_reviews.author: CINDY WOHLSTADTER

customer_reviews.title: All isn’t what it seems from looking at product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty but very hard to assemble one of the parts we’re hard to put together the holes don’t line up now there’s an open part and that’s not safe for my baby to play with I’m not happy with this item
customer_reviews.author: donesha

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and engaging
customer_reviews.text: It’s super colorful qnd my kiddo spends 30-45 mins by himself ... it’s a pain to assemble though - not your usual 5 min setup toy
customer_reviews.author: M.prime

customer_reviews.title: Well made !
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my first one, and we enjoyed so much this ! Even if there is no musical toy, my Baby played with this very well and very easy to assemble, clean up. And still using this for my second baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Bright & colourful
customer_reviews.text: This activity center is very bright, colourful with lots of different items to keep the little ones entertained. I think it will grow with the child as they get bigger. At 6 months old i think my little one is a bit on the small side for it yet, but does like it all the same.
customer_reviews.author: RC.14

customer_reviews.title: My daughter has had so much fun with this
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had so much fun with this. She's 6 months now. We started when she was right around 4 months. I think she will be enjoying this until at least 9 months. Don't use it too often for you can teach your baby incorrect positioning for standing and delay their development in this area. But it is great for 10-15 min when you're cooking dinner OR to use as a play station with the baby sitting or standing outside the toy. Good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Janel B.

customer_reviews.title: Good playtime!
customer_reviews.text: My baby LOVES this! Gives her playtime while I can do other things! I wish the bottom came out so that she could be able to move when she's ready to start walking.
customer_reviews.author: Diva D

customer_reviews.title: Great product,  a must buy
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves it! It is great. I have three big dogs that run into it all the time and it still looks new. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MarcyNumNums

customer_reviews.title: she loved sitting in it and great for if you are ...
customer_reviews.text: my 5 mos old grand daughter got a lot of use out of this,she loved sitting in it and great for if you are trying to entertain you little one while doing house work
customer_reviews.author: Kay P.

customer_reviews.title: Pink & cute but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot of toys & the height doesn’t adjust. Should have gotten the baby Einstein one.
customer_reviews.author: Beantown

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this item
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this item. Bought it for my baby princess, and there are so many toys that come with, as well as attachment zones for other toys. She loves to spin around and visit the different areas. I love how easy it is to break down! It's easy to bring for travel for that very reason. Nothing negative to say about this.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: THe mirror flower broke off within two weeks. My husband was able to get it back in but it falls out sometimes now. Very bright and fun. Baby does get flustered because he wants to lean over and chew on everything but he can't reach it. Not a product issue just something to think about if you have a baby who insists on chewing everything! He will spend a max of 15 mins in this which allows me to get maybe one thing done, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: 4 month old granddaughter loves this and spends a lot of time in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaisweezy

customer_reviews.title: This entertained it girl for months! Only improvement would ...
customer_reviews.text: This entertained it girl for months! Only improvement would be if they could add a few more toys for extra stimulation, maybe ones little babies could play with it ones with lights.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Comer

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for chewing
customer_reviews.text: I loved this toy until my daughter got teeth this week. She has had teeth for 5 days and the paint is already chipping off. This is a baby toy, the paint should not come off with chewing.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My husband (wife writing review) bought this for our son when he was about 4 months and it's pretty good. He outgrew it at 10 months, but I tried to clean it outside with the water hose and I think some water remained inside the bouncing pad since I wasn't able to take it apart. One of the attachments broke off and it didn't stay on. Overall, I do recommend this product if you're looking to save space and it's light weight.
customer_reviews.author: JAMS

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love this.. cute and sturdy. Bought for my parents house when they babysit my daughter and couldn't be more happy.
customer_reviews.author: Deonna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Came fast easy to put together, great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Undecided...........
customer_reviews.text: The jury is still out on this one. It was for my grand-daughter, who is now 6 months old. She enjoys it, & it is very cute. The issue is that if she gets to bouncing, it does not seem to be entirely stable, & my daughter is worried enough that she stays right there if she is in it. If it starts to tip, I would change this to a 2 star rating & probably send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Granny

customer_reviews.title: Babies love this!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great toy! It’s a little time consuming when putting it together but other than that it has been great!
customer_reviews.author: megan briggs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I just set it up and my daughter is really enjoying it
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Needs cushion
customer_reviews.text: It’s definitely cute & my daughter seems to be enjoying it, but a cushion around the o art that spins where she sits would be better. Also, instructions at times are tricky. Watch where you place the toys for they are extremely difficult to remove. We ended up removing the pointy orange “toys.” My daughter almost hit her head off of them.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: was purchased as a gift and I can't be any happier with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Saddam Elbu

customer_reviews.title: Great activity center!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. The blue disc on the bounces. It has straps under the seat that grows with baby. This keeps her busy for hours!!!
customer_reviews.author: mrscauf

customer_reviews.title: nice product but hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: once i finally got it together i loved it but the directions are only pictures and they aren’t very clear as to where each toy goes. it was also hard to snap the pieces on; but once done my daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Love love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter when she was 4.5 months old. She absolutely loved it, and still does! It keeps her entertained while doing chores. The only down part is that the seat doesn't offer much padding. Other than that I'll still give it 5 stars because of the smiles and laughter my daughter fills the room with while playing in this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Play time fav
customer_reviews.text: My daughter lovessssss it !!! I first put her in it at 4 months old . She Is now 6 months and still loves it ! At first I thought the tree things were in the way and placed in bad position but now that my daughter is 6 months she loves to play with them all the time .
customer_reviews.author: katelyn

customer_reviews.title: i highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves it. she’s 10 months now but she got it at 6 months. she never wants to come out. she loves all the toy options. this is the best one i have seen. DEF would order again as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Tiarah L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little vacation for mommy and daddy to clean. Great distraction for a while for baby.
customer_reviews.author: Ganera

customer_reviews.title: Product lies and says there is a height adjustment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking that the height will adjust and it does not. The box even indicates that it has 3 height adjustments. The only thing it that does adjust is the seat. Even that doesn't work well. Waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Fun for your little one
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was three months when I started putting her in here and she loves it still. It won't keep your child entertained for hours but if you need to cook or do the dishes it's great. My only con is that the larger pieces come out very easily. Despite its size it's incredibly light weight and easy to take with you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Riley

customer_reviews.title: So far she likes it
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was cheaper since it doesnt play music but so far my 8 month old likes it
customer_reviews.author: Nila

customer_reviews.title: Height of you child
customer_reviews.text: This bouncer is really good but not so good for any baby over 6months to small baby is unable to bounce on it she’s tall not suitable for her
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz

customer_reviews.title: 9 month old loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, only took about 10 minutes. We’ve used it for about 4 months and haven’t had any problems! My daughter loves all of the cute engaging toys and can spin easily to reach them all.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: It is a great toy the only problem was that there e with ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a great toy the only problem was that there e with the Mirror was a little bent which didn't let it stand to much but it's still good. Also if you place a toy in the wrong area of the circle thing it is very hard to get it out. But over all I love this for my little sister she is 5 months and she loves It too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this seat and it has really helped her strengthen her legs and back. It’s bright fun and she’s always excited to play in it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is about to be 6 months & she can already turn all the way around in her new toy. I read some reviews where they said it's hard for their child to turn, but at least in my case, buying this toy was the best decision I've made. I also read the toys come out very easily, but again my daughter plays with them & they don't come like other reviews complained about.
customer_reviews.author: L1209

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grandson!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves this! His hand eye coordination has progressed so much! Love it! Easy transaction. Speedy delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Val Schaffner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it bought it for my one granddaughter and now my son and his wife are going to have a baby girl and I had to order this for them to the babies just love it great to have
customer_reviews.author: Janice Roberts

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I was a little frustrated with the instructions as they were hard to follow and I put something in the wrong place and cannot remove it. My 5 month old loves it though.
customer_reviews.author: Kels Rubi

customer_reviews.title: Shipped in manufacturers box
customer_reviews.text: I have no qualms about the actual product however, it shipped in the manufactures box. Arrived with shipping labels all over it, dirty and banged up pretty badly. It is a gift needed in 2 days...already had to apologize for how shotty it will look. Would return it in a heart beat if time allowed. VERY disappointed in the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Both of my twins loved this and preferred it to the jumper
customer_reviews.text: Both of my twins loved this and preferred it to the jumper, which was also pretty fun for them. The jumper has lights and music, and this does not, but seemed to make no difference. I think they just liked the novelty of standing up and also liked the toys on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ros

customer_reviews.title: It is good quality, but my 6 month old has never ...
customer_reviews.text: It is good quality, but my 6 month old has never been fond of this seat. The longest I can get her to sit in it is 10 minutes, but that's with a lot of whining and entertaining from her siblings. She is much happier in a simple walker or seat with 1-2 toys in reach.
customer_reviews.author: BRANDI HORN

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bouncy toy!
customer_reviews.text: My grand baby loves her new toy! She bounces and turns. It’s a great choice for you loved one 👶🏼!
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: maybe one day he'll like it. Assembly was pretty easy
customer_reviews.text: My little one isn't very interested in it yet! But we'll keep trying to put him in there, maybe one day he'll like it. Assembly was pretty easy. It would have been even easier had it not looked like someone beat the box up with a bat once we got it. My husband had to bend the plastic in certain places because it was damaged. The toys are bright and colorful, and our son will play with them for the 2 minutes we can get him in there.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Walker

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointed since this product was delivered brand new
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast. Within the short amount of time since the purchase, the stripped tall mirror has snapped. Pretty disappointed since this product was delivered brand new. It doesn't look like it can be put back to standing position.
customer_reviews.author: shan007

customer_reviews.title: Best activity center!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I had gone to babies r us to look at activity centers but held out for this one and I'm so glad I did! When assembling, some pieces are harder to snap in than others but that meant that no matter how hard my daughter tried to pull on the toys, they haven't come off! She loves it, so I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tawny Boyce

product_meta.title: Bright Starts Springin' Safari Bounce-a-Bout Activity Center
product_meta.description: Color:Spring In' SafariThe Springin' Safari Bounce A Round from Bright Starts provides 360Degree of activities and bouncing action to keep baby entertained while playing. More than just a bouncer, the Springin' Safari Bounce A Round seat rotates so baby can play with the interactive toys all around. Whimsical characters and toys located on the activity tray encourage baby to bend, reach, rattle, spin, pop, and grip. When little ones grow, the seat can be adjusted to 3 different height positions to ensure comfort. A washable seat pad makes cleanup easy. Do not allow children who can stand or walk on their own to sit in the seat of the activity center
feature_bullets: 12 plus activities include interactive toys and cute characters; Unique bounce pad for playtime fun
Seat rotates 360 degree for non-stop interaction with fun activity stations; Lays flat for storage
Built-in storage tray is easy to clean; Machine washable seat pad
Adjustable seat height positions allow to grow with baby
